title: DPS-BEST OF- Sep 15, 2020
itunes:title: DPS-BEST OF- Sep 15, 2020
description:
Dan Patrick reacts to both Monday Night Football games and explains why the Steelers might be the most interesting team to watch this year and questions Vic Fangio not using timeouts at the end of the Broncos game against the Titans. Dan says that Thursday night's match up between the Bengals and Browns could already be a must win game for Cleveland. Steve Levy joins Dan Patrick to share his thoughts on Monday night's games and everything else happening in the NFL. And Washington Football Team Head Coach Ron Rivera joins the show to discuss Dwayne Haskins progression as a quarterback, Washington's defense, and Cam Newton in New England

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

Steve Levy joins Dan Patrick to share his thoughts on Monday night's games and everything else happening in the NFL.
